analyzed: de lta yin dang de nyid ma 'chol ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: If that were the case, then that would be an unmixed proof.

original: des na ma 'chol bar bsgrub pa'i don la ni dngos po med pa'i don med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na ma 'chol bar bsgrub pa'i don la ni dngos po med pa'i don med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, in the case of an unmixed proof, the meaning of nonexistence is definitely nonexistent.

original: don med pa yod pa dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: don med pa yod pa dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Anticipating the qualm, ‚ÄúIf that is nonexistent, it is pointless,‚Äù

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúWell then,‚Äù and so on.

original: lan ni mngon sum gyis grub pa'i dngos po med pa'i tha snyad la dngos po med pa gzhan gyis bsgrubs pas ci bya /
analyzed: lan ni mngon sum gyis grub pa'i dngos po med pa'i tha snyad la dngos po med pa gzhan gyis bsgrubs pas ci bya /
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúWhat is the use of proving nonexistence by another nonexistence in the case of the term ‚Äònonexistent‚Äô that is established by direct perception?‚Äù

original: 'dis ni ma rmongs pa la mngon sum nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i tha snyad sgrub pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni ma rmongs pa la mngon sum nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i tha snyad sgrub pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches that for one who is not confused, the term ‚Äònonexistent‚Äô is established by direct perception itself.

original: da ni rmongs pa'i dbang du byas te brjod pa ni tha snyad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ni rmongs pa'i dbang du byas te brjod pa ni tha snyad ces bya ba'o //
translated: Now, in terms of delusion, it is called conventional.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni khyad par can nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni khyad par can nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: The reality is the experience of the distinction.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dngos po med pa lam 'chol ba mi 'grub pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dngos po med pa lam 'chol ba mi 'grub pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in that way, a non-existent thing cannot be established as a non-existent thing, therefore...

original: dngos po rnams tha dad pa yin yang ci ltar phan tshun med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po rnams tha dad pa yin yang ci ltar phan tshun med pa yin zhe na /
translated: Even though things are different, how can they be mutually non-existent?

original: tha dad de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: That very difference is called reality.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: Therefore is the conclusion.

original: blo zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs dang bum pa'i shes pa dag go //
analyzed: blo zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs dang bum pa'i shes pa dag go //
translated: The mind is the cognition of the place and the pot.

original: de'i don zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs dang bum pa dag gis dbye ba 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs dang bum pa dag gis dbye ba 'grub pa'o //
translated: The object is the establishment of the distinction by the place and the pot.

original: de lta min zhes bya ba ni @232b dngos po med pas bsgrub pa'i dngos med kyi tha dad pa 'grub na'o //
analyzed: de lta min zhes bya ba ni @232b dngos po med pas bsgrub pa'i dngos med kyi tha dad pa 'grub na'o //
translated: If it were not so, if the non-existence were established as the difference of the non-existent thing, then...

original: 'chad pa ni blo ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni blo ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation is the mind....

original: de las kyang zhes bya ba ni rang rig pas grub pa gzhan las ldan pa'i shes pa las so //
analyzed: de las kyang zhes bya ba ni rang rig pas grub pa gzhan las ldan pa'i shes pa las so //
translated: And from that means from the cognition that is possessed by the other, which is established by reflexive awareness.

original: da ni phyed phyi ma 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ni phyed phyi ma 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, the latter half is explained: if...

original: de lta yin no zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i tshad mas tha dad par bsgrub na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin no zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i tshad mas tha dad par bsgrub na'o //
translated: If it were like that means if non-existence is established by valid cognition as different.

original: ci ltar thug pa med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar thug pa med ce na /
translated: How is there no infinite regress?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is like this...

original: dngos po med pa'i tshad mas dngos po min pa 'grub pa yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i tshad mas dngos po min pa 'grub pa yin /
translated: Non-existence is established by valid cognition as non-existence.

original: gal te tha dad pa sgrub par byed pa yin na de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i tshad ma de yang zla bor gyur ba'i bum pa dran pa gzhan gyis nges par gzung ba yin la dran pa yang bzlog pa'i zla bo nyid kyi mngon sum gyis bzung ba
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa sgrub par byed pa yin na de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i tshad ma de yang zla bor gyur ba'i bum pa dran pa gzhan gyis nges par gzung ba yin la dran pa yang bzlog pa'i zla bo nyid kyi mngon sum gyis bzung ba
translated: If it establishes difference, then that non-existent valid cognition is definitely apprehended by another memory of a pot that is its counterpart, and the memory is also apprehended by the direct perception of the counterpart that is its opposite.

original: shing rtas stong ba gzhan med pa nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: shing rtas stong ba gzhan med pa nyid kyis yin no //
translated: It is because there is no other emptiness of the chariot.

original: des na sngar mngon sum gyis bum pa shing rtas dben pa nyid du bzung ba ni dngos po med pa ni don med do //
analyzed: des na sngar mngon sum gyis bum pa shing rtas dben pa nyid du bzung ba ni dngos po med pa ni don med do //
translated: Therefore, the previous direct perception that apprehended the pot as devoid of a chariot is meaningless, since it is a non-entity.

original: de dang 'dra bar da ltar yang bum pas dben pa'i shing rta mngon sum nyid kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar da ltar yang bum pas dben pa'i shing rta mngon sum nyid kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, now also the pot devoid of a chariot would be apprehended by direct perception.

original: des na dngos po med pas ci zhig bya zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na dngos po med pas ci zhig bya zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, what is the use of a non-entity? This is the intended meaning.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
translated: If means if it is explained.

original: 'on te da lta don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te da lta don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is not meaningless now,

original: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: in that case means in that way.

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi dus na yod pa'i bum pa la'o //üîΩde'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa'i tshad ma skyes pa'i dus na yang ngo //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi dus na yod pa'i bum pa la'o // de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa'i tshad ma skyes pa'i dus na yang ngo //
translated: There means in the pot that existed in the past.üîΩAt that time means at the time when the valid cognition of the non-existence of other entities has not yet arisen.

original: de bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa skye ba'i dus su yang dran pa la ltos pas thug pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa skye ba'i dus su yang dran pa la ltos pas thug pa med do //
translated: In the same way, at the time when the non-existence of other entities arises, there is also an infinite regress due to relying on memory.

original: gal te phyir 'dzin pa sngar bzlog zla nyid du ci ltar dran zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phyir 'dzin pa sngar bzlog zla nyid du ci ltar dran zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how it is remembered that the previous apprehender is reversed into the moon,

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ste thug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ste thug pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚Äúthis‚Äù refers to the infinite.

original: ci zhig mi srid snyam na /
analyzed: ci zhig mi srid snyam na /
translated: If it is thought that nothing is impossible,

original: gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúby whom‚Äù is mentioned.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'i dus na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù is the time of previously apprehending the vase.

original: 'di las zhes bya ba ni phyis bzung ba'i shing rta las so //
analyzed: 'di las zhes bya ba ni phyis bzung ba'i shing rta las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom this‚Äù is from later apprehending the chariot.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni thug pa med pa'am /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni thug pa med pa'am /
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù is the infinite.

original: dngos po med pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug pas na'o//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug pas na'o//
translated: Since the valid knowledge of nonentity does not engage,

original: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i tshad mar smra ba'i lta ba las so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i tshad mar smra ba'i lta ba las so //
translated: ‚Äúother‚Äù is from the view of the proponent of the valid knowledge of nonentity.

original: 'o na ci ltar khyed kyi mngon sum las tha dad pa ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar khyed kyi mngon sum las tha dad pa ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: Well then, how is it realized that it is different from your direct perception?

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúnature‚Äù is mentioned.

original: gzhan dang ma 'dres pa myong ba las dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba bsal pa ni gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dang ma 'dres pa myong ba las dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba bsal pa ni gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Since it is not mixed with other things, the experience becomes the characteristic of the object.

original: @233a * // 'o na khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nyams su myong ba nyid gzhan pa rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: @233a * // 'o na khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nyams su myong ba nyid gzhan pa rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Well then, the experience of the nature of the qualified itself is the apprehension of the other.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: And for that very reason,

original: de las khyad par can dmigs pa nyid ces bya ba /
analyzed: de las khyad par can dmigs pa nyid ces bya ba /
translated: it is said that the qualified is perceived from that.

original: bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs de las khyad par can 'ba' zhig pa'i sa phyogs dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid dgag par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa de mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs de las khyad par can 'ba' zhig pa'i sa phyogs dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid dgag par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa de mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The perception of the qualified alone in the place that is the side with the pot is the non-perception of that which is to be refuted.

original: phyed snga ma rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas bshad nas /
analyzed: phyed snga ma rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the first half in terms of concomitance,

original: ldog pa'i sgo nas 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: ldog pa'i sgo nas 'chad pa ni /
translated: he explains the second half in terms of the counter-pervasion:

original: khyad par can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The qualified is not perceived.

original: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: The nature of the qualified is what is meant by ‚Äúsuch.‚Äù

original: de ni bum pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bum pa'o //
translated: That is the pot.

original: de la ni /
analyzed: de la ni /
translated: In that,

original: shing rta la'o //üîΩmed pa ci ltar mngon sum las yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: shing rta la'o // med pa ci ltar mngon sum las yin par 'gyur te /
translated: in the chariot.

original: ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: How could non-existence be from perception? It could not be!

original: de'i bdag nyid dgag pa ltar brten pa dgag par yang ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dgag pa ltar brten pa dgag par yang ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Just as the negation of its identity is so, why wouldn‚Äôt the negation of its dependence be so?

original: yul dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe object‚Äù and so forth.

original: des na de'i bdag nyid dgag pa la ni mngon sum gyis byed pa 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: des na de'i bdag nyid dgag pa la ni mngon sum gyis byed pa 'jug pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, in the negation of its identity, direct perception is operative.

original: brten ba dgag pa ni dngos po med pa'i tshad ma las so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsam pa'o //
analyzed: brten ba dgag pa ni dngos po med pa'i tshad ma las so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsam pa'o //
translated: The negation of its dependence is from the valid cognition of non-existence. This is the thought of the opponent.

original: sgro btags nas dngos po med par mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgro btags nas dngos po med par mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having superimposed, it is established by direct perception that it is non-existent. This is indicated by ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat itself‚Äù is the experience of the special nature.

original: phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel pa ni khyad par can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel pa ni khyad par can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The latter half is commented on by ‚Äúthe special.‚Äù

original: 'on te sa phyogs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin khyad par can rtogs pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sa phyogs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin khyad par can rtogs pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: But if it is the realization of the special nature of the place and so forth,

original: gal te bum pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te bum pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: if it is the so-called pot,

original: 'on te dngos po med pa ma rtogs par khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dngos po med pa ma rtogs par khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that without realizing the nonexistence of the thing, the experience of the nature of the thing does not occur,

original: dngos po med pa ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the thing.‚Äù

original: gal te dngos po med pa ma rtogs par rang gi ngo bo rtogs par mi 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po med pa ma rtogs par rang gi ngo bo rtogs par mi 'dod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that without realizing the nonexistence of the thing, you do not realize its nature,

original: rang gi ngo bo zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo zhes gsungs te /
translated: then it is said, ‚ÄúIts nature.‚ÄùüîΩThe idea is that if that does not exist, it is not tenable that the nonexistence of the thing is realized.

original: de med na dngos po med pa rtogs pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //üîΩ'on te dngos po med pa rang gi ngo bos rtogs par 'dod pas bya ba kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: de med na dngos po med pa rtogs pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o // 'on te dngos po med pa rang gi ngo bos rtogs par 'dod pas bya ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the nonexistence of the thing is realized by its nature, then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the thing.‚ÄùüîΩThe idea is that since the nonexistence of the thing is established by its nature, it is not established by another.

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if you say that the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the thing.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir zhes de ltar dngos po med pa gzhan la sgrub par byed pa med pa de'i phyir ro //üîΩ'o na mi dmigs pa gang yin snyam na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes de ltar dngos po med pa gzhan la sgrub par byed pa med pa de'i phyir ro // 'o na mi dmigs pa gang yin snyam na /
translated: The idea is that since the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, it is not established by its nature.

original: de zhes bya ba ste sa phyogs so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ste sa phyogs so //
translated: But if you say that the nonexistence of the thing is established by its nature, then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the thing.‚ÄùüîΩThe idea is that since the nonexistence of the thing is established by its nature, it is not established by another.üîΩBut if you say that the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the thing.‚ÄùüîΩThe idea is that since the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, it is not established by its nature.üîΩBut if you say that the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the thing.‚ÄùüîΩThe idea is that since the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, it is not established by its nature.üîΩBut if you say that the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the thing.‚ÄùüîΩThe idea is that since the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, it is not established by its nature.üîΩBut if you say that the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the thing.‚ÄùüîΩThe idea is that since the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, it is not established by its nature.

original: gzhan ni dgag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni dgag par bya ba'o //
translated: But if you say that the nonexistence of the thing is established by another, then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nonexistence of the

original: gang gi phyir dmigs pa nyid mi @233b dmigs pa yin pa des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dmigs pa nyid mi @233b dmigs pa yin pa des na'o //
translated: Because the very object of observation is not observed, that is, because of that.

original: grub pa'i mi dmigs pa des kyang rang nyid tsam gyi 'jug pa gang la yod pa ste de dag dgag par bya ba med pa'i rnam par gzhag pa de'i go byed de 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: grub pa'i mi dmigs pa des kyang rang nyid tsam gyi 'jug pa gang la yod pa ste de dag dgag par bya ba med pa'i rnam par gzhag pa de'i go byed de 'jug pa yin no //
translated: And by that non-observation of establishment, that which has the engagement of mere self is that which is to be refuted, and that which is the cause of understanding that is the engagement.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gzhan gyi tshe rung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gzhan gyi tshe rung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, at another time, the suitability is to be established.

original: 'o na don med pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na don med pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is the useless?

original: des na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore,

original: gang gi phyir dngos po med pa gzhan ma yin pa des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po med pa gzhan ma yin pa des na'o //
translated: because non-entity is not other, that is, because of that.

original: rang bzhin ni nges pa'i sa phyogs kyi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa gang yin pa nyid dngos po med pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni nges pa'i sa phyogs kyi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa gang yin pa nyid dngos po med pa yin no //
translated: The nature is the non-observation of the nature of the object of observation of the definite place, and that itself is non-entity.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Well then,

original: ci ltar don rang las mi 'grub kyi 'on kyang rang gi shes pa las yin pa de bzhin du don med pa yang rang las ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar don rang las mi 'grub kyi 'on kyang rang gi shes pa las yin pa de bzhin du don med pa yang rang las ma yin te /
translated: just as the object is not established from itself, but rather from its own consciousness, in the same way, the non-entity is not from itself.

original: 'on kyang rang gi shes pa med pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi shes pa med pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: But the meaning is that it is due to the nonexistence of one‚Äôs own consciousness.

original: de ltar yin mod kyi 'on kyang thug pa med pa las ci ltar thar snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar yin mod kyi 'on kyang thug pa med pa las ci ltar thar snyam na /
translated: Even though this is so, one might still wonder, ‚ÄúHow can one escape an infinite regress?‚Äù

original: dmigs pa yod pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa yod pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúIf there is an object of perception . . .‚Äù

original: shes pa ni rang nyid kyis 'grub pas na de med pa yang rang las 'grub pa'i phyir thug pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa ni rang nyid kyis 'grub pas na de med pa yang rang las 'grub pa'i phyir thug pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: Since consciousness is established by itself, its nonexistence is also established by itself, so there is no infinite regress.

original: dngos po med pa ni nam yang rang las 'grub pa mi srid pas na thug pa med pa kho na'o zhes lan brjod pa ni de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni nam yang rang las 'grub pa mi srid pas na thug pa med pa kho na'o zhes lan brjod pa ni de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since it is never possible for a nonentity to be established by itself, there is only an infinite regress.

original: ci ltar ba bcol chos she na //
analyzed: ci ltar ba bcol chos she na //
translated: How is it like a borrowed ornament?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúIf . . .‚Äù

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù is a response to an objection.

original: shes pa gzhan rang rig pas dmigs pa'i phyir na shes pa med pa ni mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan rang rig pas dmigs pa'i phyir na shes pa med pa ni mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa yin te /
translated: Since another consciousness is observed by reflexive awareness, the nonexistence of consciousness is established by perception itself.

original: des na thug pa med pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: des na thug pa med pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: Therefore, there is no infinite regress.

original: ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rtsod pa nyid rnam par 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rtsod pa nyid rnam par 'grel pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚ÄúIf you say‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on presents the opponent‚Äôs response.

original: gzhan gyi mngon sum zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi mngon sum zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe perception of another‚Äù

original: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes pa gzhan las so //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes pa gzhan las so //
translated: means the perception of a consciousness that is of a different nature from the consciousness that perceives the object.

original: lan ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //

original: dngos po'i med pa'i tha snyad kyang mngon sum nyid las yin mod /
analyzed: dngos po'i med pa'i tha snyad kyang mngon sum nyid las yin mod /
translated: ‚ÄúWell then, the nonexistence of an entity is also established by perception.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pas ci bya /
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pas ci bya /

original: 'dis ni slob dpon chos mchog la sogs pa yang gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni slob dpon chos mchog la sogs pa yang gsal ba yin no //
translated: This also clarifies the position of the master Dharmottara and others.

original: de ni shes pa med pa'i tha snyad kho na mngon sum las grub par 'dod kyi /
analyzed: de ni shes pa med pa'i tha snyad kho na mngon sum las grub par 'dod kyi /
translated: They maintain that the nonexistence of a consciousness is established by perception itself.

original: don med pa'i tha snyad ni rmongs pa las ni snang ba ma dmigs pa las yin la /
analyzed: don med pa'i tha snyad ni rmongs pa las ni snang ba ma dmigs pa las yin la /
translated: The nonexistence of an object is established by the nonobservation of an object that appears.

original: rmongs pa las ni khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa las yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: rmongs pa las ni khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa las yin par 'dod do //
translated: The nonexistence of a difference is established by the nonobservation of a difference.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni @234a * //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni @234a * //
translated: The phrase ‚ÄúIf you say‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on presents the opponent‚Äôs response.

original: rtsod pa'o // gzhan gyi mngon sum zhes bya ba ni don las so //
analyzed: rtsod pa'o // gzhan gyi mngon sum zhes bya ba ni don las so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe perception of another‚Äù means the perception of an object.

original: ci'i phyir mi 'grub snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi 'grub snyam na /
translated: Why is it not established?

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The characteristic of the object.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa la yin pa nyid ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa la yin pa nyid ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it that it is just the characteristic of the object?

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni dngos po kho na'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni dngos po kho na'o //
translated: That is, it is just the entity.

original: rig pa yang rig pa de kho na ltar ro zhe na rig pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa yang rig pa de kho na ltar ro zhe na rig pa ni zhes bya ba'o //

original: rig pa nyid rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rig pa nyid rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: des na rig pa de las rig pa gzhan de med pa ni gzhan gyi mngon sum las grub bo //
analyzed: des na rig pa de las rig pa gzhan de med pa ni gzhan gyi mngon sum las grub bo //
translated: Therefore, the non-existence of another awareness apart from that awareness is established by the other's perception.

original: 'di ni slob dpon yang bzhed pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ni slob dpon yang bzhed pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: This is also accepted by the master. This is what is being said:

original: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //

original: shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni don med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pa ni mngon sum rang nyid las rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni don med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pa ni mngon sum rang nyid las rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The characteristic of the non-existence of awareness means that the non-apprehension of the characteristic of the non-existence of the object is understood from the direct perception itself. This is the meaning.

original: lan ni gzhan dmigs pas rigs pa gzhan med pa ci ltar rtogs /
analyzed: lan ni gzhan dmigs pas rigs pa gzhan med pa ci ltar rtogs /
translated: The answer is: How is the non-existence of another reason understood from the apprehension of another?

original: pha rol po zhes bya ba ni mchog tu'i don to //
analyzed: pha rol po zhes bya ba ni mchog tu'i don to //
translated: The other has the sense of the highest.

original: gzhan dmigs pas ni rigs pa gzhan yod pa'am med pa 'phrig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dmigs pas ni rigs pa gzhan yod pa'am med pa 'phrig pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that the non-existence of another object is ascertained by the non-perception of another object.

original: des na ci ltar des dngos po med pa brtags par 'gyur /
analyzed: des na ci ltar des dngos po med pa brtags par 'gyur /

original: dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Anticipating this doubt, he says, ‚ÄúIf it is thought that‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: rig pa gzhan rig pa gzhan gyis dben pas na med par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: rig pa gzhan rig pa gzhan gyis dben pas na med par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is thought that the non-existence of another cognition is understood because of the absence of another cognition,

original: lan ni de zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni de zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the response is, ‚ÄúThat‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: des dben pa nyid ci ltar mi dmigs pa las ma yin te /
analyzed: des dben pa nyid ci ltar mi dmigs pa las ma yin te /
translated: How is the absence of that not non-apprehension?

original: shes pa gzhan med par bsgrub pa ni mi dmigs pa kho na las yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa gzhan med par bsgrub pa ni mi dmigs pa kho na las yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The proof of the non-existence of another cognition is only from non-apprehension. This is the meaning.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: des dben pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: des dben pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe absence of that‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: de lta na yang ci ltar mi dmigs pa yin zhe na /üîΩdes dben pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang ci ltar mi dmigs pa yin zhe na / des dben pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even so, how is it non-apprehension?üîΩ‚ÄúThe absence of that‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: ‚ÄúBut if‚Ä¶‚Äù is another case.

original: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Ä¶‚Äù is the response.

original: gang gi phyir des dben pa nyid mi dmigs pa yin pa des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir des dben pa nyid mi dmigs pa yin pa des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because the absence of that is non-apprehension, therefore, etc.

original: ma yin par dgag pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The nature of an absolute negation is

original: shes pa dang shes bya'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of consciousness and the object of consciousness.

original: 'o na gang zhig rmongs pa la bltos nas tha snyad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gang zhig rmongs pa la bltos nas tha snyad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: But what is non-apprehension that is established as a convention in dependence on delusion?üîΩThat itself is

original: de nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is the same as the above.üîΩ

original: gzhan las ni rmongs pa la bltos te'o //
analyzed: gzhan las ni rmongs pa la bltos te'o //
translated: But from another point of view, it is in dependence on delusion.

original: 'o na ci ltar 'di mi dmigs so zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar 'di mi dmigs so zhes brjod ce na /
translated: But how can it be said that this is non-apprehension?üîΩThis is

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the ‚Äúthus.‚ÄùüîΩ

original: don gyis med @234b pa dgag pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: don gyis med @234b pa dgag pa ma yin pa /
translated: It is not a non-affirming negation.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩde dang zhes bya ba ste shes pa dang don tha dad pa med pas so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / de dang zhes bya ba ste shes pa dang don tha dad pa med pas so //
translated: Why is that?üîΩBecause of that,

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa med pa nyid do //
translated: that itself is the absence of consciousness.

original: gal te de lta yin tu zad mdo de ltar na yang don med pa mngon sum gyis grub ce na /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin tu zad mdo de ltar na yang don med pa mngon sum gyis grub ce na /
translated: If that is so, then the non-existence of the object is established by perception.üîΩWhen,

original: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: that is,

original: de zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of emptiness, the non-apprehension of an object.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa 'di ni zhes bya ba ni de ltar yin na rang bzhin mi dmigs pa dngos po med pa'i sgrub byed du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa 'di ni zhes bya ba ni de ltar yin na rang bzhin mi dmigs pa dngos po med pa'i sgrub byed du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This non-observation of intrinsic nature is not a proof of non-existence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir shes pa dang shes bya ba'i gzhi thams cad du mngon sum nyid bltar rung gi dngos po med pa rigs par byed par 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa dang shes bya ba'i gzhi thams cad du mngon sum nyid bltar rung gi dngos po med pa rigs par byed par 'gyur bas so //
translated: Because non-observation of a perceptible object is a proof of non-existence.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ste /

original: bltar rung ba'i med pa mngon sum gyis grub pa de dag gal te /
analyzed: bltar rung ba'i med pa mngon sum gyis grub pa de dag gal te /
translated: If non-perceptible objects were established by perception,

analyzed: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin na de'i tshe'o //
translated: then non-observation of a pervader would be a proof of non-existence.

original: lhag ma rnam par 'grel ba ni /
analyzed: lhag ma rnam par 'grel ba ni /

original: 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said.

original: ci skad du ma rmongs pa la ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: ci skad du ma rmongs pa la ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin la /
translated: Non-observation of a pervader is for one who is not confused.üîΩBut for one who is confused, it is non-observation of intrinsic nature.

original: rmongs pa la ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pas yin no zhes bya ba ste sun 'byin pa ni /
analyzed: rmongs pa la ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pas yin no zhes bya ba ste sun 'byin pa ni /

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa nyid do //
