analyzed: rags 'dzugs de ni zhes bya ba'i phyogs phyi ma bzlog pa'i don du brjod pa ni / 'on te zhes bya ba'o // de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.

original: khyab par nyid la sogs par ro //üîΩdes par byas pa ni sems dang ldan pa la ltos te /
analyzed: khyab par nyid la sogs par ro // des par byas pa ni sems dang ldan pa la ltos te /
translated: If it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.üîΩIf it is a means of crossing over, then it is not purposeless.

original: nges par rtog pa la rtsod pa med do //
analyzed: nges par rtog pa la rtsod pa med do //
translated: If it is a means of crossing over,

original: sems dang mi ldan pa la ni sems dang ldan par sgro btags nas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sems dang mi ldan pa la ni sems dang ldan par sgro btags nas brjod pa yin no //
translated: But it is said that the non-mental is superimposed as mental.

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni gyo mo yang ste thob la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni gyo mo yang ste thob la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad pa'o //
translated: And this means that not only the pot, etc.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni tho ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni tho ba la yang ngo //
translated: But also the shards, etc.

original: snga ma nyid ces bya ba ni bum pa grub pa'am ma grub pa zhig 'gal zlas bzlog par bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i phyogs gnyis la brjod pa'i mi nus pa dang mi dgos pa'i mtshan nyid ni gyo mo la sogs pa la yang yin no //üîΩphan tshun zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang gyo mo dag phan tshun spangs pa tsam gyis ni /
analyzed: snga ma nyid ces bya ba ni bum pa grub pa'am ma grub pa zhig 'gal zlas bzlog par bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i phyogs gnyis la brjod pa'i mi nus pa dang mi dgos pa'i mtshan nyid ni gyo mo la sogs pa la yang yin no // phan tshun zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang gyo mo dag phan tshun spangs pa tsam gyis ni /
translated: are the same as before, i.e., whether the pot is established or not, the opponent cannot say that it is to be refuted by its opposite, because the characteristics of impossibility and uselessness are also in the shards, etc.üîΩMutually means that the pot and the shards, etc.

original: gyo mo la sogs pa bum pa'i zlog byed du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gyo mo la sogs pa bum pa'i zlog byed du mi 'gyur te /
translated: are not the refuters of the pot by the mere mutual exclusion of the pot and the shards, etc.

original: de lta na ni 'di shing gi yang zlog par byed par yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'di shing gi yang zlog par byed par yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because in that case, it would be the refuter of the tree, etc.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs par ni don 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs par ni don 'di yin te /
translated: But if, etc. means that the meaning is this.

original: dngos po dus gzhan du gnas pa la 'jug pa'i rgyus ston pa mi sgrub pa byed pa yin pa des na 'jig pa'i rgyu don med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po dus gzhan du gnas pa la 'jug pa'i rgyus ston pa mi sgrub pa byed pa yin pa des na 'jig pa'i rgyu don med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cause of the thing‚Äôs abiding at another time is not established by the cause of its destruction, therefore the cause of destruction is not purposeless.

original: dus gzhan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lan yang don 'di yin te /
analyzed: dus gzhan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lan yang don 'di yin te /
translated: The response to ‚Äúat another time‚Äù and so on is also this:

original: gal te dngos po bstan bya yin na de'i de tshe de gzhan du bya bar mi nus te /
analyzed: gal te dngos po bstan bya yin na de'i de tshe de gzhan du bya bar mi nus te /
translated: If the thing is to be shown, then at that time it cannot be made to be another.

original: des na gal te 'jig par byed pas de la stong par byed na /
analyzed: des na gal te 'jig par byed pas de la stong par byed na /
translated: Therefore, if the thing is to be destroyed by the cause of destruction,

original: de la brten pa'i stong pa nyid gcig byed grang na //
analyzed: de la brten pa'i stong pa nyid gcig byed grang na //
translated: then the emptiness that is based on it is made to be one.

original: brten pas ni rten 'jig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brten pas ni rten 'jig pa ma yin no //
translated: But the basis is not destroyed by the based.

original: chus bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: chus bum pa bzhin no //
translated: Like a pot by water.

original: chus bum par gnas pas de nyid 'jig par ni byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chus bum par gnas pas de nyid 'jig par ni byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The pot‚Äôs abiding in water does not cause it to be destroyed.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni bum pa som btang pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni bum pa som btang pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOn that‚Äù refers to the fired pot.

original: bum pa so ma btang pa ni 'jig pa'i ngang can 'dod pa'i phyir na dus gzhan du gnas pa nyid ma grub po //
analyzed: bum pa so ma btang pa ni 'jig pa'i ngang can 'dod pa'i phyir na dus gzhan du gnas pa nyid ma grub po //
translated: Since the unfired pot is asserted to be perishable, it is not established that it abides at another time.

original: gal te gzhi gang la bstan pa nyid lhag par rlom pa de ni brten pas 'jig pa ma yin te zhes brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te gzhi gang la bstan pa nyid lhag par rlom pa de ni brten pas 'jig pa ma yin te zhes brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: If you think that the basis itself is not destroyed by the cause of destruction, because it is supported,

original: des na dus gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos po la 'jig pa'i rgyu byed @240b pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas so //
analyzed: des na dus gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos po la 'jig pa'i rgyu byed @240b pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas so //
translated: then the cause of destruction does not act on a thing that endures for another moment.

original: yang gzhan dag rjes su dpag pas grub pa'i dus gzhan du gnas pa 'gal bas zlog bar byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang gzhan dag rjes su dpag pas grub pa'i dus gzhan du gnas pa 'gal bas zlog bar byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Others say that the proof by inference of enduring for another moment is refuted by contradiction.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa dag ni bum pa dus gzhan du gnas par khas blangs nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa dag ni bum pa dus gzhan du gnas par khas blangs nas /
translated: Thus, worldly people accept that a pot endures for another moment,

original: de gzhig pa'i ched du tho ba la sogs pa rab tu sbyor te /
analyzed: de gzhig pa'i ched du tho ba la sogs pa rab tu sbyor te /
translated: and for the sake of destroying it, they apply a hammer, etc.

original: des na dus gzhan du gnas pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: des na dus gzhan du gnas pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, enduring for another moment is what is to be established.

original: sta re la sogs pa sbyor ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: sta re la sogs pa sbyor ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The application of an axe, etc. is the reason.

original: gal te dngos po gnas pa ma yin na ni 'jig pa'i rgyu yang mi sbyor ba zhig na byed pa yang yin te des dngos po ni bstan ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: gal te dngos po gnas pa ma yin na ni 'jig pa'i rgyu yang mi sbyor ba zhig na byed pa yang yin te des dngos po ni bstan ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: If the thing does not endure, then the cause of destruction would not be connected with it, but it is connected with it. Therefore, the thing is only indicated. This is the inference.

original: 'dis ni dus gzhan du gnas pa la grub pa ni 'gal bas log par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni dus gzhan du gnas pa la grub pa ni 'gal bas log par byed pa yin no //
translated: By this, the establishment of endurance at another time is refuted by contradiction.

original: des na 'jig pa'i rgyu ni don med pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na 'jig pa'i rgyu ni don med pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the cause of destruction is not purposeless. This is the intended meaning.

original: rab tu grub pa bstan pa na'o //
analyzed: rab tu grub pa bstan pa na'o //
translated: The teaching of the establishment is this:

original: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas ma grub pa gzhan du gyur pa nyid ni med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas ma grub pa gzhan du gyur pa nyid ni med pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù means that the transformation of something not established by inference is non-existence.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni dngos por grub pa'i tshad ma med pas na /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni dngos por grub pa'i tshad ma med pas na /
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means that because there is no valid cognition establishing existence,

original: yod pa'i tha snyad du mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa'i tha snyad du mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the convention of existence is not suitable.

original: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni mngon sum dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni mngon sum dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the first half is ‚Äúlike direct perception.‚Äù

original: des grub pa yang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis grub pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rjes su dpag pas grub pa yang ngo //
analyzed: des grub pa yang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis grub pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rjes su dpag pas grub pa yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúAnd that is established‚Äù means that not only is it established by perception, but also by inference.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas grub pa'i bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas grub pa'i bstan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the teaching that is established by inference.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause without that.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir bstan pa de med na rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin bstan par rtogs pa mi bden pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ba de'i phyir na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bstan pa de med na rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin bstan par rtogs pa mi bden pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ba de'i phyir na /
translated: Because if that teaching were not to exist, then the teaching of the nature of inference would not be understood, and so it would not be a valid cognition.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin na /
translated: If inference is not a valid cognition,

original: mngon sum yang tshad mar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum yang tshad mar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then perception also would not be a valid cognition.

original: de med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause without that‚Äù means because without perception and inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa bstan pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes mi brjod mod kyi /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa bstan pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes mi brjod mod kyi /
translated: Although it is not said that the proof of the teaching of inference is the means of knowledge,

original: 'on kyang srid pa tsam du rtog pa yin no zhes dogs pa ni 'gyur bar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang srid pa tsam du rtog pa yin no zhes dogs pa ni 'gyur bar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: nevertheless, it is imagined that it is merely possible.

original: byed phyi ma bshad pa'i don du dgos par byed pa ni /
analyzed: byed phyi ma bshad pa'i don du dgos par byed pa ni /
translated: The purpose of the latter is to explain the meaning of the word ‚Äúbut.‚Äù

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúbut‚Äù is for the purpose of refuting the two positions.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni bum pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni bum pa bstan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very‚Äù means the demonstrated pot.

original: phyogs gnyi ga yang sun 'byin pa ni bum sogs zhes @241a * //
analyzed: phyogs gnyi ga yang sun 'byin pa ni bum sogs zhes @241a * //
translated: The refutation of both positions is stated in the words ‚Äúthe pot, etc.‚Äù

original: bya ba ste sogs pa'i sgras 'jig pa'i rdzas la ste /
analyzed: bya ba ste sogs pa'i sgras 'jig pa'i rdzas la ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the substance of destruction.

original: rnam pa gzhan nyid du grub zin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan nyid du grub zin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since the other aspect is already established,

original: 'jim pa la sogs pa'i rdzas de ci ltar mthong bar ma gyur /
analyzed: 'jim pa la sogs pa'i rdzas de ci ltar mthong bar ma gyur /
translated: how is it that the substance, such as clay, is not seen?

original: gal te bum pa la sogs pa'i chos can la chos gzhan du gyur pa nyid grub na de lta na yang bum pa la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te bum pa la sogs pa'i chos can la chos gzhan du gyur pa nyid grub na de lta na yang bum pa la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the property of the subject, such as the pot, is established as another property, then in that case the pot, etc., would be seen,

original: ma log pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma log pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it would not be reversed. This is the meaning.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyogs dang po rjes su brjod nas bum pa la gzhan nyid kyi zhes bya ba ste rnam par 'grel pas bzlog pa ni gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyogs dang po rjes su brjod nas bum pa la gzhan nyid kyi zhes bya ba ste rnam par 'grel pas bzlog pa ni gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having restated the first position with the words ‚Äúif, etc.,‚Äù the refutation is stated in the words ‚Äúthe otherness of the pot, etc.‚Äù The commentary reverses the statement with the words ‚Äúthe other.‚Äù

original: de nyid ni bum pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni bum pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very‚Äù means the pot itself.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni gzhan du gyur pa'i gzhi yin pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni gzhan du gyur pa'i gzhi yin pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means that it is the basis of transformation.

original: bum pa ma mthong na ni gzhan gyis 'di skad brjod par rigs so zhes gsungs pas ni bum pa sngon du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bum pa ma mthong na ni gzhan gyis 'di skad brjod par rigs so zhes gsungs pas ni bum pa sngon du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since it is said that ‚Äúwhen the pot is not seen, it is proper for another to say this,‚Äù the pot precedes.

original: de'i ni bum pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i ni bum pa'i'o //
translated: That is the pot‚Äôs.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod par ni don 'di yin te /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod par ni don 'di yin te /
translated: The dispute beginning with ‚ÄúIf‚Äù has this meaning.

original: gal te bum pa'i 'jig pa yin na de'i tshe bum pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi gzhan du gyur pa tha dad par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te bum pa'i 'jig pa yin na de'i tshe bum pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi gzhan du gyur pa tha dad par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it is the destruction of the pot, then the transformation that precedes the pot would be different.

original: 'jig pa med na go ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa med na go ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is no destruction, how is it?

original: lan ni 'jig pa de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni 'jig pa de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is ‚ÄúThat destruction also.‚Äù

original: gzhan du gyur pa kho na la 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te des na thug pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa kho na la 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te des na thug pa med do //
translated: It would be only a transformation, not otherwise, and therefore there is no infinite regress.

original: dang po 'jig pa yod na gzhan du gyur la /üîΩgzhan du gyur pa na yang 'jig pa gnyis pa /
analyzed: dang po 'jig pa yod na gzhan du gyur la / gzhan du gyur pa na yang 'jig pa gnyis pa /
translated: If there is destruction in the beginning, there is transformation.üîΩAnd when there is transformation, there is a second destruction.

original: 'jig pa gnyis pa yod na yang //
analyzed: 'jig pa gnyis pa yod na yang //
translated: If there is a second destruction,

original: gzhan du gyur pa gnyis pa /
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa gnyis pa /
translated: there is a second transformation.

original: gzhan du gyur pa gnyis pa yin na yang 'jig pa gsum pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa gnyis pa yin na yang 'jig pa gsum pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the second transformation, it is the third destruction.

original: yang na thug pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa med pa la brjod do //
analyzed: yang na thug pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa med pa la brjod do //
translated: Or, the term ‚Äúinfinite regress‚Äù means ‚Äúwithout stability.‚Äù

original: des kyang phan tshun rten pa mtshon ba'o //
analyzed: des kyang phan tshun rten pa mtshon ba'o //
translated: And that also illustrates mutual dependence.

original: 'on te 'jim pa'i rdzas la 'dod ces bya ba de rnam par 'grel ba ni 'on te 'jim pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te 'jim pa'i rdzas la 'dod ces bya ba de rnam par 'grel ba ni 'on te 'jim pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, if you explain the term ‚Äúsubstance of clay,‚Äù then the explanation is ‚Äúthe clay.‚Äù

original: bum sogs la ni zhes sogs pa'i sgras bsdus pa /
analyzed: bum sogs la ni zhes sogs pa'i sgras bsdus pa /
translated: ‚ÄúAnd so on‚Äù in ‚Äúand so on with pots and so on‚Äù is inclusive.

original: rnam par 'grel pas lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba ste 'jim pa'i rdzas kyang ngo //
analyzed: rnam par 'grel pas lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba ste 'jim pa'i rdzas kyang ngo //
translated: The reply by way of explanation is ‚ÄúThat also‚Äù is the substance of clay.

original: de zhes bya ba ni 'jim pa'i rdzas so //üîΩgzhan yang 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi dus sam /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni 'jim pa'i rdzas so // gzhan yang 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi dus sam /
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the substance of clay.

original: dus gzhan du 'jig pa de 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dus gzhan du 'jig pa de 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Moreover, the substance of clay is either at the time of the clay or at another time.üîΩThat is the transformation.

original: re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: First, it is said that the first position is not so.

original: der yang zhes bya ba ste 'jim pa'i rdzas la yang bum pa skye ba las snga @241b rol gyi 'jim pa'i rdzas bum pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni mi 'jig go //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ste 'jim pa'i rdzas la yang bum pa skye ba las snga @241b rol gyi 'jim pa'i rdzas bum pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni mi 'jig go //
translated: Also means that the substance of clay is not destroyed as the cause of the pot prior to the arising of the pot.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi dus na 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te skyed byed kyi 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi dus na ni de 'jig pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi dus na 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro // gal te skyed byed kyi 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi dus na ni de 'jig pa ma yin gyi /
translated: At that time means that at the time of the substance of clay, destruction does not exist.üîΩIf you say that at the time of the substance of clay that generates it, it is not destroyed,

original: de'i de ma thag par skye ba'i bum pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i 'jim pa'i rdzas 'jig pa yin no zhe na phyi ma yang ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: dper na 'bras bu'i las la gegs byed pa med pa can gyi tshogs pa bzhin no //

original: de bzhin du dngos po yang 'jig pa'i don du gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin no des na de yod pa la nges pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po yang 'jig pa'i don du gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin no des na de yod pa la nges pa kho na'o //
translated: In the same way, an entity does not depend on another for the purpose of destruction, and therefore it is definitely existent.

original: de la nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu skyed pa la nges pa'o //
analyzed: de la nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu skyed pa la nges pa'o //
translated: In that regard, ‚Äúdefinite‚Äù means definite in producing an effect.

original: de bzhin du dngos po yang 'jig pa la ltos pa cung zad kyang med de /üîΩdes na 'jig pa la mi @243a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po yang 'jig pa la ltos pa cung zad kyang med de / des na 'jig pa la mi @243a * //
translated: In the same way, an entity does not depend on destruction in the slightest.

original: ltos pas dngos po rnams ni skad cig ma kho na'o //
analyzed: ltos pas dngos po rnams ni skad cig ma kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, since it does not depend on destruction, entities are momentary.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: because there is no connection.

original: 'jig pa rgyu dang bcas pa'i phyogs la ni skye ba dang ldan pa nyid 'jig pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jig pa rgyu dang bcas pa'i phyogs la ni skye ba dang ldan pa nyid 'jig pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te /
translated: In the case of destruction having a cause, the possession of origination is not connected with destruction,

original: skyes pa gnas par khas len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes pa gnas par khas len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is accepted that what has originated endures.

original: ltos pa med pa'i phyogs la yang 'brel pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i phyogs la yang 'brel pa med do zhe na /
translated: And in the case of destruction being without a cause, there is no connection.

original: 'jig pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is called ‚Äúdestruction‚Äù?

original: de'i bdag ces bya ba 'jig pa'i bdag nyid la 'brel pas na /
analyzed: de'i bdag ces bya ba 'jig pa'i bdag nyid la 'brel pas na /
translated: The self of that, i.e., the self of destruction, is connected with origination.

original: bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa skye ba dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa skye ba dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
translated: Origination is the proof of the probandum impermanence.

original: ci'i phyir 'bras bu nyid kyis kyang rtags ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'bras bu nyid kyis kyang rtags ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is the effect not a reason?

original: phyis 'byung phyir na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyis 'byung phyir na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it occurs later.

original: ci'i phyir rigs pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rigs pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not a logical ground?

original: phyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it occurs later.

original: 'o na rgyu nyid kyis de de'i rtags yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rgyu nyid kyis de de'i rtags yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well, then, the cause itself would be the reason for that.

original: 'bras bu ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The effect is.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pas na'o //
translated: Therefore, because of error.

original: de ni skye ba dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni skye ba dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: That is the possession of arising.

original: gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i'o //
translated: The reason is not so, that is, it is not so that destruction is the reason.

original: rgyu med pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid kyis /
translated: By reason of causelessness, that is, by reason of the causelessness of destruction.

original: dngos po dang 'jig pa dag de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ga las te ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang 'jig pa dag de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ga las te ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: How could things and destruction be of the same nature? They are not!

original: tho ba la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yin yang /
analyzed: tho ba la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yin yang /
translated: Even though the existence and non-existence of a pot, etc. follow after the existence and non-existence of a hammer, etc.,

original: 'jig pa 'bras bu nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩ'bras bu'i chos kyang zhes bya ba'i 'jig pa gang zhig /'jig pa'i rgyu gang med kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'jig pa 'bras bu nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na / 'bras bu'i chos kyang zhes bya ba'i 'jig pa gang zhig /'jig pa'i rgyu gang med kyang ngo //
translated: destruction is not the effect of a hammer, etc.üîΩEven though a thing is an effect, that is, even though destruction is an effect,

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni me la sogs pa'i rgyu can no //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni me la sogs pa'i rgyu can no //
translated: destruction is not the effect of a cause of destruction, even though it is the cause of a hammer, etc.üîΩThat, that is, the existence of a thing,

original: dngos po yod pa'i dus na ni de'i bdag nyid kyi 'jig pa yod pa yin na /
analyzed: dngos po yod pa'i dus na ni de'i bdag nyid kyi 'jig pa yod pa yin na /
translated: at the time of the existence of a thing, is of the nature of destruction.

original: de'i tshe ni 'jig pa'i rgyu yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni 'jig pa'i rgyu yod pa ma yin no //
translated: At that time, the cause of destruction does not exist.

original: des na 'jig pa'i rgyu med par 'byung ba'i 'jig pa ni de'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'jig pa'i rgyu med par 'byung ba'i 'jig pa ni de'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, destruction that occurs without a cause of destruction would not be caused by that.

original: gal te tho ba la sogs pa yod na /
analyzed: gal te tho ba la sogs pa yod na /
translated: If a hammer, etc. exists,

original: 'jig par 'gyur ba'i phyir na de'i rgyu can nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig par 'gyur ba'i phyir na de'i rgyu can nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: destruction would occur, so it is caused by that.

original: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúmerely by the presence of that.‚Äù

original: 'on te thob las ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'jig pa ni tho ba med par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te thob las ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'jig pa ni tho ba med par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if destruction that is similar to a hammer, etc. does not occur without a hammer, etc.,

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚Äúhow?‚Äù

original: skyes ma thag tu yang gzhan dang 'brel pa med par rtogs so zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: skyes ma thag tu yang gzhan dang 'brel pa med par rtogs so zhes 'brel to //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúit is understood that it is not related to another immediately after arising.‚Äù

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sngar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúpreviously also.‚Äù

original: 'on te 'jig byed nye ba'i dus na 'jig pa de dang mi 'dra ba 'byung ba yin na @243b zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig byed nye ba'i dus na 'jig pa de dang mi 'dra ba 'byung ba yin na @243b zhe na /
translated: But if destruction that is dissimilar to that which is related to the cause of destruction occurs,

original: phyis kyang zhes bya ba ste tho ba la sogs pa rang phrad pa'i dus na yang ngo //
analyzed: phyis kyang zhes bya ba ste tho ba la sogs pa rang phrad pa'i dus na yang ngo //
translated: it is said, ‚Äúlater also,‚Äù that is, even when a hammer, etc. is related to it.

original: de zhes bya ba ma 'brel bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ma 'brel bar byas pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúthat‚Äù without being related.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni bum pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni bum pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to a pot, etc.

original: de kho na ltar zhes bya ba ni 'byor ba nyid do //
analyzed: de kho na ltar zhes bya ba ni 'byor ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as‚Äù refers to the fact that it is not tenable.

original: der ni 'jig pa la'o //
analyzed: der ni 'jig pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù refers to destruction.

original: ci'i phyir nye bar mi spyor zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir nye bar mi spyor zhe na /
translated: Why is it not tenable?

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ste 'byor ba nyid du rtogs pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ste 'byor ba nyid du rtogs pa'i dus na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù refers to the time when one understands that it is not tenable.

original: des ni 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: des ni 'jig pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù refers to destruction.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga ltar yang dngos po rang gi rgyu las skye ba na 'jig pa'i byed pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga ltar yang dngos po rang gi rgyu las skye ba na 'jig pa'i byed pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means that in both cases, when a thing arises from its own cause, it is not tenable that destruction is its agent.

original: ci ltar mngon sum gyis de ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: ci ltar mngon sum gyis de ltar rtogs she na /
translated: How is this understood through perception?

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that it is not so.

original: mngon sum gyis de lta ma yin par mi rtogs mod /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis de lta ma yin par mi rtogs mod /
translated: It is not that perception does not understand it to be otherwise.

original: dngos po ni de lta ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na gang zhig zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po ni de lta ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na gang zhig zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúA thing‚Äù would not be so.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩgzhan tu gyur pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / gzhan tu gyur pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: Why is that?

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the transformation itself‚Äù means because of the non-momentariness itself.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i rgyu mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i rgyu mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore means because the cause of destruction is not tenable.

original: 'jig pa der nges pa ni 'jig pa la ltos pa med pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: 'jig pa der nges pa ni 'jig pa la ltos pa med pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Destruction is ascertained as that because it is independent.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba 'jig pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa ni der nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba 'jig pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa ni der nges pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is dependent on another, i.e., destruction, is not ascertained as that.

original: gal te ltos pa dang bcas kyang gdon mi za bar phyis 'gyur ba yod do zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ltos pa dang bcas kyang gdon mi za bar phyis 'gyur ba yod do zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you suspect that even though it is dependent, it certainly occurs later, the response is: If you think that.

original: ci ltar ltos pa dang bcas snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar ltos pa dang bcas snyam na /
translated: How is it dependent?

original: ltos pa med pa nyid yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa nyid yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is independent.

original: 'char ba dang nub pa'i de ma thag kho nar 'char ba dang nub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'char ba dang nub pa'i de ma thag kho nar 'char ba dang nub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the rising and setting occur immediately after the rising and setting,

original: des na de dag ltos pa dang bcas so zhes rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na de dag ltos pa dang bcas so zhes rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: therefore, it is understood that they are dependent.

original: dpe yang rjes su mthun pa ma yin no zhas brjod pa ni tshogs pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe yang rjes su mthun pa ma yin no zhas brjod pa ni tshogs pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The example is not similar, he says: The collection also.

original: dngos med pa la zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa la'o //
analyzed: dngos med pa la zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa la'o //
translated: In the absence of an entity means in the absence of a difference.

original: bzlog pa nyid du zhes bya ba ni dngos po nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa nyid du zhes bya ba ni dngos po nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The reversal itself is the establishment of the entity.

original: ci ltar ma khyab ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar ma khyab ce na /
translated: How is it not pervasion?

original: res 'ga' zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Sometimes, etc.

original: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the first half is:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If, etc.

original: phyed phyi ma 'chad pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma 'chad pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The explanation of the second half is: In this way, etc.

original: thun mong gi ma nges pa nyid brjod nas /
analyzed: thun mong gi ma nges pa nyid brjod nas /
translated: Having stated the common uncertainty,

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog par the tshom za ba nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog par the tshom za ba nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: he states the doubt about the reversal from the discordant side:

original: rgyun gang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyun gang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Which continuum, etc.

original: gzhan pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad du mi 'char bar yang srid pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad du mi 'char bar yang srid pa yin no //
translated: The otherness, etc. is the possibility of non-appearance in any way.

original: nub par khas blangs nas gnyis po 'di brjod par zad de /
analyzed: nub par khas blangs nas gnyis po 'di brjod par zad de /
translated: Having accepted the setting, he states these two:
This, etc.

original: rnam par gzhag pa nyid du yang nus pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa nyid du yang nus pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: This is not even possible as a presentation.üîΩHe states:

original: bum pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bum pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The pot, etc.

original: 'di dag de gnyis kyis 'khrul pa med pa yin yang /
analyzed: 'di dag de gnyis kyis 'khrul pa med pa yin yang /
translated: Although these two are non-erroneous,

original: thams cad du mi 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad du mi 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: It is not that it is non-erroneous in all cases.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Moreover‚Äù means:

original: gal te 'char ba dang nub pa 'ga' zhig gdon mi za bar yin pa de ltan yang gzhan byas ba dag ni de lta ma yin pas zhes bya ba gdon mi za bar 'gyur pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: gal te 'char ba dang nub pa 'ga' zhig gdon mi za bar yin pa de ltan yang gzhan byas ba dag ni de lta ma yin pas zhes bya ba gdon mi za bar 'gyur pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Even if it is certain that there is rising and setting, still, that is not the case with other things, and so it is not certain.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Because they are dependent.‚Äù

original: de yang mi rung te zhes bya ba ni de nyid sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang mi rung te zhes bya ba ni de nyid sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: That is also not tenable.

original: gang dngos po gang zhig ngo bo gzhan te myu gu la nges pa de ni rang gi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can gyi 'jig pa la rang gi rgyu las de ltar de nges par ni shin tu gsal ba kho nar cis ma rtogs te rtogs pa khoüîΩna'o // 'on te 'jig pa yang gzhan kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang dngos po gang zhig ngo bo gzhan te myu gu la nges pa de ni rang gi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can gyi 'jig pa la rang gi rgyu las de ltar de nges par ni shin tu gsal ba kho nar cis ma rtogs te rtogs pa kho na'o // 'on te 'jig pa yang gzhan kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: That very thing which is determined as having a different nature, such as a sprout, has a nature that is essentially perishable. It is determined by its cause to be that way. Why is that not very clear? It is clear.üîΩBut if you think that destruction is something else,

original: 'jig pa zhes bya ba zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'jig pa zhes bya ba zhes smos so //
translated: then he says, ‚ÄúDestruction is not something else.‚Äù

original: 'o na 'jig pa gang yin zhe na 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na 'jig pa gang yin zhe na 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But what is destruction?üîΩBut if that is so, how can there be a different expression, ‚Äúdestruction of a thing‚Äù?üîΩMoreover, if you think that the destruction of a thing is not a thing, then why do you say that it is a thing?

original: 'o na dngos po'i 'jig pa zhes tha dad pa'i tha snyad du ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /üîΩmtshi  gu'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na dngos po'i 'jig pa zhes tha dad pa'i tha snyad du ci ltar 'gyur zhe na / mtshi  gu'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Again, if you think that the destruction of a thing is a thing, then why do you say that it is not a thing?

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni des na dpe des zhes bya ba la sogs pa sun 'byin pa'o //üîΩspyir zhes bya ba ni gang zhig gang gis ngo bo la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i ngo bor nges pa yin no zhes spyir 'byung ba'am 'jig pa la ltos pa med par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni des na dpe des zhes bya ba la sogs pa sun 'byin pa'o // spyir zhes bya ba ni gang zhig gang gis ngo bo la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i ngo bor nges pa yin no zhes spyir 'byung ba'am 'jig pa la ltos pa med par ston pa yin no //
translated: Again, if you think that the destruction of a thing is not a thing, then why do you say that it is the destruction of a thing?

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni /üîΩmyu gu'i dngos po la ni tshogs pa nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni / myu gu'i dngos po la ni tshogs pa nges pa yin gyi /
translated: Again, if you think that the destruction of a thing is a thing, then why do you say that it is not a thing?

original: dngos po med pa 'jig pa la ni nges pa ma yin no zhes dngos po dang dngos po med par rtogs pa ni /üîΩltag chod de lan ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa 'jig pa la ni nges pa ma yin no zhes dngos po dang dngos po med par rtogs pa ni / ltag chod de lan ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: Again, if you think that the destruction of a thing is not a thing, then why do you say that it is the destruction of a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is a thing, then why do you say that it is not a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is not a thing, then why do you say that it is the destruction of a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is a thing, then why do you say that it is not a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is not a thing, then why do you say that it is the destruction of a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is a thing, then why do you say that it is not a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is not a thing, then why do you say that it is the destruction of a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is a thing, then why do you say that it is not a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is not a thing, then why do you say that it is the destruction of a thing?

original: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: Again, if you think that the destruction of a thing is a thing, then why do you say that it is not a thing?üîΩAgain, if you think that the destruction of a thing is not a thing, then why do you say that it is the destruction of a thing?

original: sgra dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and sound.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skabs kyi mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skabs kyi mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Therefore‚Äù concludes the topic.

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa dang nges par 'gyur ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i tshad mas gnod pa'i dper brjod pa bshad pa yin la /
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa dang nges par 'gyur ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i tshad mas gnod pa'i dper brjod pa bshad pa yin la /
translated: The example of the refutation by a valid cognition of the sort that is ‚Äúdependent‚Äù and ‚Äúdeterminate‚Äù has been explained.

original: de yang 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i rang bzhin kho na yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i rang bzhin kho na yin no //
translated: And that is only the nature of the observation of a pervasion by contradiction.

original: gtan tshigs gnyis nyid ces bya ba ni 'brel ba yod pas na'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis nyid ces bya ba ni 'brel ba yod pas na'o //
translated: ‚Äú The two reasons‚Äù are because of the existence of the relation.

original: gtan tshigs 'gal ba las gzhan dag ni ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'gal ba las gzhan dag ni ma nges pa'o //
translated: The other reasons besides the contradictory reason are the indefinite.

original: rnam pa lnga nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa lnga nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: The clarification of the very five types is

original: de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú That is to say.

original: gal te @244b 'di gnyis nye bar bkod pa gzhan gyi go bar byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa spang ba'i don yin na /
analyzed: gal te @244b 'di gnyis nye bar bkod pa gzhan gyi go bar byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa spang ba'i don yin na /
translated: ‚Äù If the two that are set forth here are accepted as the very means of making others understand the abandonment of the object,

original: 'o na lhag ma rnams ci'i don du nye bar bkod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na lhag ma rnams ci'i don du nye bar bkod ce na /
translated: then for what purpose are the remaining ones set forth?

original: lhag ma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú The remaining ones‚Äù are as follows.

original: ci ltar rtogs pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin par sgrub ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar rtogs pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin par sgrub ce na /
translated: How is it that the reason is established as the means of making one understand by way of the realization?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means in this way.

original: yid tsam zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yid tsam zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúMere‚Äù means

original: yod pa tsam dang mnyam pa dang lhag pa zhes zlas dbye ba'o //
analyzed: yod pa tsam dang mnyam pa dang lhag pa zhes zlas dbye ba'o //
translated: mere existence, equality, and superiority.

original: yod pa tsam gyis ni rjes su 'gro ba stobs chung bar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa tsam gyis ni rjes su 'gro ba stobs chung bar brjod pa'o //
translated: Mere existence is said to be a weak form of pervasion.

original: mnyam pas ni mtshungs par ro //
analyzed: mnyam pas ni mtshungs par ro //
translated: Equality is a middling form.

original: lhag pas na stobs che ba'o //
analyzed: lhag pas na stobs che ba'o //
translated: Superiority is a strong form.üîΩHow is it that none of the three types of pervasion is an indicator?

original: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba rnam pa gsum ka yang go bar byed pa ma yin zhe na gal te zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'di la zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba rnam pa gsum ka yang go bar byed pa ma yin zhe na gal te zhes bya ba'o // 'di la zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù meansüîΩ‚Äúin this case,‚Äù which refers to impermanence.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba yang mi rtag pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba yang mi rtag pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to impermanence.

original: gal te rjes su 'gro ba stobs dang ldan pa yin yang ldog pa'i khyad par la ma ltos par ci ltar go bar byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su 'gro ba stobs dang ldan pa yin yang ldog pa'i khyad par la ma ltos par ci ltar go bar byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: Even if pervasion is strong, how can it be an indicator if it does not depend on the distinction of the counter pervasion?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means in this way.

original: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'o ;
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'o ;
translated: ‚ÄúPrincipal‚Äù refers to pervasion.

original: / de las gzhan pa ni ldog pa'i'o //
analyzed: / de las gzhan pa ni ldog pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOther than that‚Äù refers to the counter pervasion.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: zas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFood‚Äù is the reason.

original: sbyor byed pa ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor byed pa ni nus pa'o //
translated: The application is the capacity.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'i khyad par la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'i khyad par la'o //
translated: With respect to that, i.e., the distinction of the negation,

original: sbyor bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro bas zhes bya ba skabs yin no //
analyzed: sbyor bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro bas zhes bya ba skabs yin no //
translated: there is the application, i.e., the positive concomitance.

original: 'o na ldog pa go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ldog pa go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can the distinction be the reason for understanding the positive concomitance?

original: ldog pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The distinction is called the positive concomitance.

original: de zhes bya ba ldog pa ste rjes su 'gro ba ma nyan pa la sogs pa la mi ltos par rjes su 'gro ba yod tsam la ltos te go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ldog pa ste rjes su 'gro ba ma nyan pa la sogs pa la mi ltos par rjes su 'gro ba yod tsam la ltos te go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: That, i.e., the distinction, is the positive concomitance, which is the reason for understanding the positive concomitance, which is merely the presence of the positive concomitance, without regard to the absence of the counter-example, etc.

original: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba ldog pa mnyam pa la sogs pa la ltos pa ltar ldog pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba ldog pa mnyam pa la sogs pa la ltos pa ltar ldog pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not the case that the distinction is the reason for understanding the positive concomitance, as is the case with the positive concomitance, which is the reason for understanding the distinction, etc.

original: ldog pa'i sgo nas go bar byed pa nyid khyad par gyi mthar thug par brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ldog pa'i sgo nas go bar byed pa nyid khyad par gyi mthar thug par brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement that the reason for understanding is the distinction, which is the ultimate particular, is

original: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example,

analyzed: gang gi phyir rtag pa las ldog pa'i rtsol ba las byung ba des ni /

original: rtag pa de med pa'i mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa de med pa'i mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no //

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i stobs kyis go bar byed pa nyid yin pa sun 'byin pa ni /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i stobs kyis go bar byed pa nyid yin pa sun 'byin pa ni /
translated: Refutation of the proof by the power of concomitance:

original: mi rtag pa la yod pa'i rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni rtag pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la yod pa'i rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni rtag pa'o //
translated: The effort-made nature that exists in the impermanent is permanent.

original: de med par sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de med par sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The nonexistence of that is not established.

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ni gal te mi rtag pa'i dpe bum pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid mthong ba de la yang /
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ni gal te mi rtag pa'i dpe bum pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid mthong ba de la yang /
translated: This is stated: If the effort-made nature that is seen in the impermanent example, the pot,

original: sgra rtag pa med pa nyid du @245a * //
analyzed: sgra rtag pa med pa nyid du @245a * //
translated: is the proof of the nonexistence of permanence in sound,

original: ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: then it is not the proof of the nonexistence of permanence in sound.

original: 'o na ci ltar mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub snyam na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is it a proof of impermanence?‚Äù

original: rtag pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúIn permanence.‚Äù

original: de med pa ste rtag pa med pa sgrub na'o //
analyzed: de med pa ste rtag pa med pa sgrub na'o //
translated: If the nonexistence of that, the nonexistence of permanence, is established,

original: phung po gzhan zhes bya ba mi rtag pa nyid la sgrub par byed pa 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phung po gzhan zhes bya ba mi rtag pa nyid la sgrub par byed pa 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the proof of impermanence will engage in another collection.

original: des na rtag pa las ldog pa go bar byed pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na rtag pa las ldog pa go bar byed pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the reason is understood as that which causes the understanding of the opposite of permanence.

original: rjes su 'gro ba gtsor gyur pas go bar byed pa nyid yin pa sun 'byin pa ni /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba gtsor gyur pas go bar byed pa nyid yin pa sun 'byin pa ni /
translated: The refutation of the reason being that which causes the understanding by way of the preeminence of the positive concomitance is as follows:

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In regard to another,

original: mi rtag pa nyid dang 'brel pa bum pa la mthong ba'i sgrub byed byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid dang 'brel pa bum pa la mthong ba'i sgrub byed byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni /
translated: the probans, such as being produced, which is related to impermanence and is seen in a pot,üîΩwould certainly be in regard to another, such as sound, which is related to permanence.

original: de las gzhan du zhes bya ba rtag pa nyid du 'brel pa'i sgra la sogs pa gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan du zhes bya ba rtag pa nyid du 'brel pa'i sgra la sogs pa gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: But that is not so at all.

original: gal te mi rtag pa'i bum pa btsal ma thag tu 'byung bar mthong ba de lta na yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la rtag pa la 'jug par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa'i bum pa btsal ma thag tu 'byung bar mthong ba de lta na yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la rtag pa la 'jug par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even though one sees that an impermanent pot arises immediately after being sought, still, the probandum would be engaged in permanence, that is, the subject.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is stated by ‚ÄúIf. . .

original: de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The other is the hidden.

original: de las gzhan pa'i zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'i me thob pa na'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'i me thob pa na'o //
translated: The other is the hidden fire that is obtained.

original: 'on te de yang zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'i me'o //
analyzed: 'on te de yang zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'i me'o //
translated: Or, that also is the hidden fire.

original: lkog tu gyur pa nang du sdud pa ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang bas yin pa mi srid do //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa nang du sdud pa ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang bas yin pa mi srid do //
translated: The inclusion of the hidden within the seen is impossible, because the seen is not under the control of the hidden.

original: ci ltar ldog pa nges pa la mthong ba dbang du gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar ldog pa nges pa la mthong ba dbang du gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is the determination of the exclusion not under the control of the seen?

original: mthong bas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong bas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The seen is the seen.

original: snang ba nyid ces bya ba ni da ltar ba nyid do //
analyzed: snang ba nyid ces bya ba ni da ltar ba nyid do //

original: de las gzhan zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'o //

original: 'du byed pa las zhes bya ba ni goms pa zhes grags pa las te /
analyzed: 'du byed pa las zhes bya ba ni goms pa zhes grags pa las te /
translated: From the formative forces is from the familiar.

original: bag chags kyi dbang nyid kyis gzhan du yang nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bag chags kyi dbang nyid kyis gzhan du yang nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the determination is also due to the influence of latent impressions.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin gang la snang ba ste gsal ba nyams su myong ba de las byung zhing skyes pa'i 'du byed pas ni /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin gang la snang ba ste gsal ba nyams su myong ba de las byung zhing skyes pa'i 'du byed pas ni /
translated: The formations that arise from the nature of things, that is, from the experience of the manifestation of things, are the formations of the nature of things.üîΩ

original: nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin de las nges pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin de las nges pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The nature of an entity that appears, i.e., is experienced, is the cause of the ascertainment that arises from the formative forces that originate from it.

original: des na nges pa de las gzhan ma 'ongs pa ni nges pa min no //
analyzed: des na nges pa de las gzhan ma 'ongs pa ni nges pa min no //
translated: Therefore, the future is not ascertained apart from that ascertainment.

original: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba ni gtso bo ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba ni gtso bo ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the positive concomitance is not the principal factor.

original: ldog pa ni gtso bo kho na yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ldog pa ni gtso bo kho na yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: The negative concomitance is the principal factor.

original: gang gi tshe zhis bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhis bya ba'o //
translated: When?üîΩIf, etc.

original: gal te zhes bya ba @245b la sogs pas pha rol dag slar yang rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo nyid du brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba @245b la sogs pas pha rol dag slar yang rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo nyid du brjod pa'o //
translated: The opponents again state that the positive concomitance is the principal factor.

original: brjod zin to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brjod zin to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It has been stated.

original: gang gi phyir rtag pa las ldog pa des zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtag pa las ldog pa des zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: Because of the reversal from permanence, etc.

original: gsal ba gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni dus phyis 'byung ba'i'o //
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni dus phyis 'byung ba'i'o //
translated: By another manifestation means by one that occurs later.

original: de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: That being the case means that the answer is.

original: gal te dus phyis 'byung ba'i gsal ba dang 'brel pa yin na de'i tshe sngar gyi gsal ba dang ma 'brel pa kho nar 'gyur te ;
analyzed: gal te dus phyis 'byung ba'i gsal ba dang 'brel pa yin na de'i tshe sngar gyi gsal ba dang ma 'brel pa kho nar 'gyur te ;
translated: If it is related to the manifestation that occurs later, then at that time it would be related only to the manifestation that occurred earlier,

original: phyi ma dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa ni /
analyzed: phyi ma dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro // gsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa ni /
translated: because it is related to the later one.üîΩIt is not tenable to say that it is related to another manifestation.

original: gzhan yang 'brel pa zhes bya bar ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'brel pa zhes bya bar ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is not logical to say that it is related to another manifestation.

original: sgrub par byed pa snga ma dang 'brel par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni skabs kyis so //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa snga ma dang 'brel par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni skabs kyis so //
translated: It would not be related to the earlier establishing factor, is the point.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of error.

original: sngar gyi gsal ba spangs te gsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa yin na ni /
analyzed: sngar gyi gsal ba spangs te gsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa yin na ni /
translated: If it is related to another manifestation, having abandoned the earlier manifestation,

original: sgrub par byed pa sngar gyi gsal ba la 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa sngar gyi gsal ba la 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: the establishing factor would be in error with respect to the earlier manifestation.

original: gsal ba'i spyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba'i spyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs position is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúIf the manifestation of a universal . . .‚Äù

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The response is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúThe manifestation . . .‚Äù

original: mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The response is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúThe same . . .‚Äù

original: de'i zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the universal.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù means ‚Äúotherwise‚Äù.

original: 'bras bu mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa mthong ba las so //
analyzed: 'bras bu mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa mthong ba las so //
translated: The cognition that has the form of a similar effect is seen from the cause.

original: rgyu'i zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: ‚ÄúCause‚Äù is the doctrine.

original: rgyu'i spyi zhes bya ba ni spyi dang spyi med pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu tsam mo //
analyzed: rgyu'i spyi zhes bya ba ni spyi dang spyi med pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu tsam mo //
translated: The universal of the cause is merely the cause that has the nature of a universal and a non-universal.

original: de gzhan gyis mngon par 'dod pa'i spyi rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de gzhan gyis mngon par 'dod pa'i spyi rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of the universal that is desired by others is not that.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyi de 'di lta bu zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: spyi de 'di lta bu zhes bya bar ro //
translated: Because that universal is not like this.

original: spyi med na mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa la rgyu mtshan ci yod ce na rgyu mtshan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi med na mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa la rgyu mtshan ci yod ce na rgyu mtshan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is no universal, what is the reason for the cognition that has the form of a similar? The reason is also.

original: dngos po don gcig byed pa kho na rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: dngos po don gcig byed pa kho na rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because the thing that performs the same function is the reason.

original: spyi ci bya /
analyzed: spyi ci bya /
translated: What is the use of a universal?

original: 'bras bu gcig byed pa kho na spyi yin no zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig byed pa kho na spyi yin no zhes bya bar ro //
translated: The performance of the same effect is the universal.

original: spyi med na mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can gyi ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: spyi med na mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can gyi ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: If there is no universal, how is there a cognition that has the form of a similar?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is like this.

original: gang gi phyir don gcig byed pa kho na spyi yin pa de'i phyir du ba 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don gcig byed pa kho na spyi yin pa de'i phyir du ba 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because only that which performs the same function is a universal, therefore, ‚Äúthis smoke‚Äù and so on.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni me'i gsal ba mi 'phen na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni me'i gsal ba mi 'phen na'o //
translated: If it were not so, that is, if the manifestation of fire were not projected,

original: des na ldog pa nyid gtso bor gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: des na ldog pa nyid gtso bor gyur pa yin no //
translated: then the exclusion itself would be the principal factor.

original: gang phyir 'jig las rtsol byung min dang rag min las rtag 'jig pa las //
analyzed: gang phyir 'jig las rtsol byung min dang rag min las rtag 'jig pa las //
translated: Because it does not arise from destruction, nor from a permanent thing, nor from a non-thing,

original: rtsol byung @246a * //
analyzed: rtsol byung @246a * //
translated: it does not arise from a thing.

original: rtog min rtsol las skyed bas 'jig pa gang phyir rjes dpog ba //
analyzed: rtog min rtsol las skyed bas 'jig pa gang phyir rjes dpog ba //
translated: Because it is not imagined, it is produced from effort. Destruction is inferred because it is produced from effort.

original: de phyir rjes 'gro yod snyam stobs ldan gtan tshigs nyid du gnas par ni //
analyzed: de phyir rjes 'gro yod snyam stobs ldan gtan tshigs nyid du gnas par ni //
translated: Therefore, because of the existence of concomitance, the powerful reason itself remains.

original: rig min ldog nyid bstan pas de bstan pa ni nges par 'thad pa yin //
analyzed: rig min ldog nyid bstan pas de bstan pa ni nges par 'thad pa yin //
translated: The teaching of the exclusion itself is certainly tenable.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: This is the summary.

original: gal te zhes bya la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: If, etc. is the objection.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: No, etc. is the reply.

original: 'on don gang zhig yin par 'dod ce na /
analyzed: 'on don gang zhig yin par 'dod ce na /
translated: But what is the meaning that is accepted?

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //

original: de las zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs sam 'gal ba dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs sam 'gal ba dag kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù means from the reason or the contradiction.

original: gzhan dag kyang ni zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba las gzhan ma 'brel ba'o//
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang ni zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba las gzhan ma 'brel ba'o//
translated: ‚ÄúOther‚Äù means that which is not related, that is, that which is different from the related.

original: ma nges pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma nges pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: gal te de ltar byas pas ngag 'di'i don cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar byas pas ngag 'di'i don cir 'gyur zhe na /

original: de ltar zhes bya ba'o //

original: ngag ces bya ba ni gzhan pa dag ni ma nges pa zhes bya ba 'di'i'o //
analyzed: ngag ces bya ba ni gzhan pa dag ni ma nges pa zhes bya ba 'di'i'o //

analyzed: gal te de lta na yang 'dis ci ltar lhag ma dang ldan pa ma nges pa brjod ce na /
translated: Even if it is like that, how does this express the uncertain with remainder?

original: lhag ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhag ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWith remainder‚Äù means with remainder.

original: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang ma 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang ma 'brel pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis very‚Äù means that which is not related to the probandum.

original: de nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni lhag ma dang ldan pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni lhag ma dang ldan pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can dag kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very‚Äù means that which has remainder and is not mistaken with regard to the contradiction.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar thams cad ma nges pas bsdus pa des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar thams cad ma nges pas bsdus pa des na'o //
translated: Because in that way everything is included in the uncertain, therefore.

analyzed: gal te 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can ci ltar ma nges pa nyid yin zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o // gal te bsgrub par bya ba la ma 'brel na /
translated: it is like this.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúIf there is no connection to the probandum, then how?‚Äù

original: 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: it is the other‚Äôs.
